# isLowercase

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether this character is considered lowercase.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLowercase: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Lowercase characters change when converted to uppercase, but not when converted to lowercase. The following characters are all lowercase:

- “é” (U+0065 LATIN SMALL LETTER E, U+0301 COMBINING ACUTE ACCENT)
- “и” (U+0438 CYRILLIC SMALL LETTER I)
- “π” (U+03C0 GREEK SMALL LETTER PI)

## Checking a Character’s Case

- **isCased**: A Boolean value indicating whether this character changes under any form of case conversion.
- **isUppercase**: A Boolean value indicating whether this character is considered uppercase.
- **uppercased()**: Returns an uppercased version of this character.
- **lowercased()**: Returns a lowercased version of this character.
